coded_answer.p: I'm writtingwriting this letter to complain about your fake advertisement.
You are the theatre's manager so I suppose you are the right person to complain to.

First of all, in your show advertisement it saissays that Danny Brooks startsstars in the play. But a different actor has startedstarredwas starring and that was very disappointing, not only for me but for all the people there.
The show has begunbegan laterlate, much more laterlater than your advertisement writessays, at about 20:15. The show started 45 minutes laterlate. This made me getfeel bored.
You also refersay toin your advertisement that there are some discounts available but there weren't any.
At the end you have writtensaidsaid that there is the theatre restaurant after the show but thereit wasn't. It hadwas closed because of the late start of the show.
At the endFinally, because I; hadn'tdidn't have a perfect evening but a very disappointing one, I have the right to ask for my money back.
Modern technology changedhas changed not only my daily life but also the lifelives of many people.

Now let's talk about me. First of all, I don't have to worry nin the morning about if I missmissing the bus because I have my alarm clock to wake me in time. Usually, Whenwhen I return from school the food is a litlittle of bit cold so I put it in the microwave to becomemake it hotter.

When I go to sleep after I eat my lunch (in my country, especially in summer, it is too hot.) So I turn on the airconditionair conditioning with a timer so when I getgo to sleep it to turnturns off by itself.
When I wake up, if I don't have homework I sit onat my computer and play different games to spendoccupy my time.

AtIn the evenings before I gotgetgo to bed I sit in the living room and watch TV throughvia the sattelitesatellite. When I go to bed, because there are many mosquitossmosquitoes, I turn on a special machine with a pilebattery likebattery-like thing in it which kills them.
I belivebelieve that modern technology has effectedaffected possitivepositivepositivelypositively affected our lives.
